technology.short_description: Goddess of the Harvest and Bountiful Land, Isha is beloved by all the Elves of Athel Loren.

effects.description: Income from Grape Vines: +5%
Casualty replenishment rate: +5% for Dryad, Tree Kin and Treeman units
Cooldown: -10% to Lore of Life spells

technology.short_description: The capricious God of the Ocean is less than loyal to his followers.

effects.description: Immune to Storm and Reef attrition
Income from Ports: +100%

technology.short_description: The Elves of Athel Loren know that each deity has a time and place.

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for all Elf units
Leadership: +10 when laying siege or encircling

technology.short_description: Loec the Trickster protects the souls of Wood Elves from Slaanesh's perverse, Ruinous reach.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10% for all Elf units
Cooldown: -10% to Lore of Shadows spells

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs units with 25 or more entities

technology.short_description: Protector of all that is hidden and lost, Ladrielle comes to the aid of those who wander the dark places of the world.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +20 with Bretonnia
Campaign movement range: +5%
Evasion chance when using the Worldroots: +20%

technology.short_description: Only a fool claims to have nothing to learn, the wise seek the guidance of Hoeth, Lord of Wisdom.

effects.description: [HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
Lord recruit rank: +2
Hero recruit rank: +2

technology.short_description: This powerful God of the Hunt sits side by side with his immortal love, Isha, at the heart of the Elven pantheon.

effects.description: Income from Hunting buildings: +10%
Weapon strength: +10% for Elf Cavalry, Hawk and Eagle units
Charge bonus: +15% for Elf Cavalry, Hawk and Eagle units

technology.short_description: The aloof creator of the Elves keeps his thoughts and plans well hidden from mortal eyes.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +15 with High Elves
Cooldown: -10% to Lore of High Magic spells

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description: Construction cost: -15% for all buildings

technology.short_description: Vaul the Maker works tirelessly to craft weapons to aid the Elves in the battles to come.

effects.description: Income from Resource and Crafting buildings: +10%
Armour: +10 for Elf Infantry and Cavalry units

technology.short_description: If you go down to the woods today, you might come back... changed.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 20% for Cave Bats, Feral Manticore, Giant Spiders, Great Hawks, Giant Wolves and Feral Bears units
Passive ability: "Murder of Spites" for Malevolent Treeman units

technology.short_description: When Elves dream of a great undertaking, it is Lileath whispering to them as they sleep.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve minimum: +10
	(all armies)
Hero capacity: +2 for Spellsingers

technology.short_description: As the rulers of the heavens, the Cadai watch over the Asrai.

effects.description: Forest Health: +1 per turn to all owned Magical Forests
Diplomatic relations: +15 with High Elves
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for Lore of Life and Lore of High Magic

technology.short_description: Pine is plentiful and has many practical uses.

effects.description: Upkeep: -15% for all Dryad, Tree Kin and Treeman units
Construction time: -25% for all buildings

technology.short_description: The poplar grows fast and strong.

effects.description: Growth: +25
Local Recruitment duration: -1 turn (minimum 1)

technology.short_description: The oak is stalwart and sturdy.

effects.description: Income from Province Capital/Settlement buildings: +10%
Attribute: Expert Charge Defence for Eternal Guard units

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

technology.short_description: Also known as the Crone, Morai Heg is the only god in the Elven pantheon who is neither Cadai or Cytharai.

effects.description: Campaign line of sight: +25% for all settlements and characters
Control: +1

technology.short_description: The Great Eagles of Athel Loren carry news of distant events.

effects.description: Armour-piercing weapon damage: +25 for Great Eagle units
Physical resistance: 10% for Great Eagle units
Provides line of sight over all Magical Forest regions
Beware: this will make distant foes aware of you!

technology.short_description: The willow protects with its sheltering boughs, and knows ways of healing.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10% for Dryad, Tree Kin and Treeman units
Casualty replenishment rate: +5% when in foreign territory

technology.short_description: Wisest of all who dwell in the forest of Athel Loren, the Ancients have forgotten more than most Elves learn in a lifetime.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for Lore of Beasts spells
Bound spell: "Flock of Doom" for all Ancient Treeman Lords

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs units with 120 or more entities

technology.short_description: The Asrai worship where they will, choosing to honour the gods that best fit their personalities.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2 for all units
Ability: "Heroic Killing Blow" for all Glade Lords and Glade Captains
Attribute: Causes Fear for all Elf units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

technology.short_description: The ash knows many secrets, and provides sturdy and plentiful arrows.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +10 with all factions

Ammunition: +35%
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: The yew's branches are supple, but its berries are deadly.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Yewberry Infusion" for Dryads, Tree Kin and Treeman units

Reload time reduction: +15%
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: The cypress is flexible, and remains standing when flame sweeps all else aside.

effects.description: Gain +5 additional Forest Health for razing Heathlands
Fire resistance: 25% for Dryad, Tree Kin and Treeman units
Vigour loss reduction: -25% for melee Infantry units

technology.short_description: For those that crave the destruction of their enemies, Ellinill is always happy to help.

effects.description: Gain +1 additional Forest Health for winning battles in Magical Forests or their Heathlands
Income from razing settlements: +10%

technology.short_description: The Tree of Woe is a symbol of Elf-kind's manifold failures.

effects.description: Attribute: Stalk for Giant Wolves and Giant Spider units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Deathblow" for Malevolent Dryads, Malevolent Tree Kin and Malevolent Treeman units

technology.short_description: In her dark and gloomy kingdom, Ereth Khial plots new ways to reclaim the souls of the dead from Slaanesh.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +10%

Corruption: -4
	(all provinces)

technology.short_description: The Gods of the Underworld are treacherous, but their power is undeniable.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +15 with Dark Elves
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for Lore of Shadows and Lore of Dark Magic
Global recruitment duration: -1 turn(s) (minimum 1)

technology.short_description: Goddess of the Savage Hunt and woman spurned, Anath Raema's heart rots with vengeance.

effects.description: Bonus vs Large: +5 for all Elf Cavalry, Hawk Rider and Great Eagle units
Cooldown: -10% to Lore of Beasts spells

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only
Strong vs units with 25 or more entities

effects.description: Missile strength: +10%

technology.short_description: Those who seek a quiet life, away from society, honour Drakira.

effects.description: Ambush success chance: +20%
Ambush defence chance: +20%
Leadership: +8 during ambushes
Melee attack: +6 during ambushes

technology.short_description: Those who yearn to fight in the name of honour must seek out Eldrazor.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Elf Infantry units
Physical resistance: 10% for Elf Infantry units

technology.short_description: Wrath and fire - the gifts that Addaioth offers those who worship him.

effects.description: Fire resistance: 25% for all Elf units
Weapon strength: +15% for Forest Dragons (units and mounts)

technology.short_description: The Dark Mistress of Magic, Hekarti, draws those who worship her to the darker side of magic.

effects.description: Cooldown: -10% to Lore of Dark Magic spells

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: Hukon is the Elven God of Earthquakes and one of the few surviving members of the Ellinilli.

effects.description:
Speed: +5%
	(all armies)
Charge bonus: +15 for Zoats, Treemen and Forest Dragon units

technology.onscreen_name: Nethu, Keeper of the Last Door
technology.short_description: The secrets of the Underworld are forbidden to those of the mortal realm. Nethu guards the pathways between them.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for all Elf units
Income from post-battle loot: +10%
Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

technology.short_description: They who give themselves over to the pursuit of pleasure would do well to court the favour of Atharti.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +10 with Dark Elves
Global recruitment capacity: +2
